meanings.sent1: The tibiales bone is an important part of the leg structure.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the tibiales area to check for any fractures.
meanings.sent3: The tibiales bone was feeling shy and decided to hide behind the fibula.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the tibiales bone supporting her.
meanings.sent5: The tibiales bone, like a sturdy pillar, held up the entire leg.

meanings.definition: A muscle in the lower leg.
meanings.sent1: The tibiales muscle helps in pointing the toes downward.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often strengthen their tibiales muscles for better performance.
meanings.sent3: The tibiales muscle and the calf muscle had a friendly race.
meanings.sent4: His tibiales muscle was a coiled spring ready to propel him forward.
meanings.sent5: The tibiales muscle, like a loyal soldier, never falters in its duty.
